title: high ping
body:
I was once a oversea high school dude who came from another country and I play oce lol.
however Im graduated now and I'm going back to my home country
and of corse I keep playing oce lol in my home country
but I found a problem and the problem is no matter how quick the internet speed is
I still continually having 150-200 ping
how I can solve this problem?
I would appreciate if someone could answer my question, thanks!

replies.body:
Unfortunately you can't. While you might be able to improve it by 10-20ms with the right connection, realistically it comes down to the physical distance. Just as someone in Perth is always going to have ~60+ ms, while someone in Sydney is usually going to have ~10.

150-200 ping isn't *unplayable* so long as it's stable and not jumping around a lot, but if you really can't stand it you may have to consider a server closer to you if there is one.
